mineral.name: adularia
mineral.habit: short prismatic, blocky, tabular to massive

mineral.name: amblygonite
mineral.habit: rough crystals; compact or cleavable masses

mineral.name: analcime
mineral.habit: crystals usually well-formed trapezohedrons or cubes, massive

mineral.name: aurichalcite
mineral.habit: commonly as fine tufted aggregates of hair like crystals

mineral.name: bauxite
mineral.habit: usually as stalactitic or foliated aggregates

mineral.name: brochantite
mineral.habit: prismatic to acicular and tabular, as drusy crusts.

mineral.name: cavansite
mineral.habit: prismatic crystals often as tufts or rosettes

mineral.name: cobaltite
mineral.formula: CoAsS isometric cubes; granular or compact masses

mineral.name: colemanite
mineral.habit: clear prismatic crystals; also granular or massive

mineral.name: conichalcite
mineral.habit: commonly as botryoidal or reniform crusts

mineral.name: covellite
mineral.formula: CuS hexagonal hex plates, usually massive

mineral.name: danburite
mineral.habit: clear prismatic crystals with wedge shaped ends

mineral.name: fluorapatite
mineral.habit: short or long prismatic and tabular, also masive, glovular and fibrous

mineral.name: hanksite
mineral.habit: prismatic prisms with pyramidal and/or pinacoidal terminations,tabular

mineral.name: huebnerite
mineral.formula:
MnWO 4
monoclinic prismatic, tabular; commonly in subparallel groups

mineral.name: linarite
mineral.habit: Thin lath shaped to tabular, also encrusting masses

mineral.name: mottramite
mineral.habit: prismatic or tabular, usually as plumose aggregates, drusy aggregates

mineral.name: stephanite
mineral.habit: short prismatic crystals to tabular also massive

mineral.name: variscite
mineral.habit: usually massive or as vien fillings and nodules

mineral.name: water
mineral.habit: frozen bodies of water, snow, frost and glaciers
